thread.title_full: Helen Inspires with Fitness Regime, Loved by Family and Fans Alike | Entertainment

author: Devdiscourse News Desk
title: Helen Inspires with Fitness Regime, Loved by Family and Fans Alike | Entertainment
text: Helen Inspires with Fitness Regime, Loved by Family and Fans Alike Veteran actor Helen is captivating her fans with her fitness routine. Sshura Khan shared an Instagram story featuring her 'Pilates buddy' Helen, showering admiration. Helen proves age is just a number, continuing to inspire through her appearances and performances in numerous Bollywood films. [Devdiscourse News Desk](/devdiscourse-stories)| Updated: 19-07-2024 09:29 IST | Created: 19-07-2024 09:29 IST - Country: - India Veteran Bollywood actor Helen, known for her mesmerizing performances, is now making waves with her impressive fitness regime. Arbaaz Khan's wife, Sshura Khan, recently joined the list of admirers praising Helen's dedication. On Wednesday, Sshura took to Instagram to share a heartwarming picture with her 'Pilates buddy,' Helen. The image shows Sshura planting a kiss on Helen's cheek, with their Pilates trainer Yasmin Karachiwala also in the frame. Helen, striking a cute pout, effortlessly captures the love and admiration from both her daughter-in-law and trainer. Sharing the picture, Sshura wrote, 'Pilates buddies. Helen aunty, you are such an inspiration.' Helen, an iconic figure in Bollywood, was introduced to the industry in 1953 by the famous dancer Cuckoo. She rose to prominence in 1958 with her performance in 'Mera Naam Chin Chin Choo' from the movie Howrah Bridge. The 'Mehbooba Mehbooba' star has appeared in over 700 films and continues to prove that age is just a number. Helen was first married to director Prem Narayan Arora and later to screenwriter Salim Khan. Arbaaz Khan and Sshura recently celebrated their intimate nikah ceremony. Arbaaz, previously married to Malaika Arora, expressed his joy on Instagram, announcing his union with Sshura in an emotional post. (With inputs from agencies.)
